nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
Watch for new message on the chatbot. 
This can be triggered with [n8n chat widget]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} hubspot or other chat services.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content: Post assistant Message back to chat service, in this case Hubspot

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content: Create a new Thread, save it to database and RUN

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
Search for Thread ID in a database. 

This database is maintaing references between messaging service thread id and OpenI Thread ID.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content: POST a new message to existing thread.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note8

parameters.content:
Get Run Status:
If still in progress, run again. 
If action needed go to respective action.
If Completed, post message.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note9

parameters.content:
Run required actions based on Assistant answer and respond to Assistant with the function answer. 

Each route is a function that you need to define inside your assistant configuration.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# OpenAI Assistant for Hubspot Chat

## Overview
Automated workflow: OpenAI Assistant for Hubspot Chat. This workflow integrates 10 different services: webhook, stickyNote, httpRequest, wait, airtable. It contains 59 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 59
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **getHubspotMessage**: httpRequest
- **OpenAi Create Thread**: httpRequest
- **OpenAI Run**: httpRequest
- **Get Run**: httpRequest
- **Get Last Message**: httpRequest
- **HTTP Request**: httpRequest
- **Completed, Action or Inprogress**: switch
- **Wait**: wait
- **Wait1**: wait
- **Submit Data**: httpRequest
- ... and 49 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
